name: fund
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: an amount of money saved, collected, or provided for a particular purpose

example.eg: The hospital has set up a special fund to buy new equipment.
example.egtrans: 医院专门设立了一项基金以购买新设备。

example.eg: Contributions are being sought for the disaster fund.
example.egtrans: 正在寻求对救灾基金的捐助。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: money needed or available to spend on something

example.eg: Following the repairs to the roof, church funds are now seriously depleted.
example.egtrans: 在对屋顶进行修缮之后，教堂的资金现在严重吃紧。

example.eg: The president has agreed to allocate further funds to develop the new submarine.
example.egtrans: 总统已经同意再拨一部分资金开发新潜艇。

example.eg: "Can I borrow £50?" "I'm a little short of/low on funds (= I have little money) at the moment".
example.egtrans: 我也想和你一起去度假，但最近我手头有点拮据。

example.eg: She has a fund of knowledge on the subject.
example.egtrans: 她对这一主题知之甚多。

name: fund
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to provide the money to pay for an event, activity, or organization

example.eg: The company has agreed to fund my trip to Australia.
example.egtrans: 公司同意资助我的澳大利亚之行。

example.eg: The new college is being privately funded (= money for it is not being provided from taxes).
example.egtrans: 这所新大学目前是由私人提供资金的。
